about_the_game: 《Forward Brave》has no turning back. Choose your hero, explore the program-generated card dungeon, collect resources, kill enemies, combine and match active skills with various special-effect artifacts, make rational use of various props and buffs, move to the next level, and finally win the victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10、11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200

  • Graphics: Intel HD 6000 / GeForce 550 / AMD R7 250 (AMD Radeon HD 7750)
  • Storage: 1024 GB available space
